attributes.action: We demand a hardcore enquiry involving the Police into the BookTrust Grant fast-tracked by the Deputy Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Given the reluctance of Nick Clegg to come clean about the £12 Million of taxpayers money fast-tracked to Booktrust while his wife had links to the charity we demand a hardcore enquiry involving the Police to uncover exactly how and why this money was allocated. We also demand to know the depth of the Deputy Prime Ministers involvement.
